history.proof: intros P Q H a b Hin_a Hin_b. induction H. - shelve. - apply IHOBuch in Hin_a. apply IHOBuch in Hin_b. apply Hin_a. + shelve. + shelve. - shelve.

ctx: intros P Q H a b Hin_a Hin_b.
intros P Q H a b Hin_a Hin_b.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) aL : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM Hin_a : In a aL Hin_b : In b aL Unable to unify "In a aL" with "reds a b aL".

ctx: intros P Q H a b Hin_a Hin_b.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) aL : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM Hin_a : In a aL Hin_b : In b aL Unable to unify "In b aL" with "reds a b aL".

ctx: intros P Q H a b Hin_a Hin_b.

ctx: intros P Q H a b Hin_a Hin_b.

ctx: intros P Q H a b Hin_a Hin_b.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a0 : poly A0 eqA ltM aP, Q, R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H : OBuch (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a0 aP) aP) (genPcPf (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a0 aP) aP Q) R H0 : ~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a0 aP) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM Hin_a : reds a b R Hin_b : In b R IHOBuch : In a R -> In b R -> reds a b R Unable to unify "In b R" with "In a R".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall P Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM), OBuch P (genOCPf P) Q -> forall a b : poly A0 eqA ltM, In a Q -> In b Q -> reds a b Q

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
genOCPf = fun H' : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) => list_rect (fun _ : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) => list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) nil (fun (a : poly A0 eqA ltM) (l rec : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) => genPcPf a l rec) H' : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> list (poly A0 eqA ltM) Arguments genOCPf _%list_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive OBuch : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> Prop := OBuch0 : forall aL : list (poly A0 eqA ltM), OBuch aL nil aL | OBuch1 : forall (a : poly A0 eqA ltM) (aP Q R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), OBuch (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP) (genPcPf (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP
Inductive reds : poly A0 eqA ltM -> poly A0 eqA ltM -> list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> Prop := reds0 : forall (P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (a b : poly A0 eqA ltM), red A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (spolyp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a b) P -> reds a b P | reds1 : forall (P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (a b c : poly A0 eqA ltM), In c P -> reds a c P -> reds c b P -> divp A A0 eqA mult

reduceplus_ind : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (P : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop), (forall x y : list (Term A n), eqP A eqA n x y -> P x y) ->...-> P l l0

```   
intros P Q H a b Hin_a Hin_b.
induction H.
- apply reducetop_sp with (p:=a) (q:=b) in H. apply H in Hin_a. apply H in Hin_b. apply Hin_a. apply Hin_b.
- apply IHOBuch in Hin_a. apply IHOBuch in Hin_b. apply red_incl with (q:=a) in H. exists proof (reds a b Q). apply Hin_a. apply Hin_b. auto.
```

original: intros P Q H a b Hin_a Hin_b. induction H. - apply reducetop_sp with (p:=a) (q:=b) in H. apply H in Hin_a. apply H in Hin_b. apply Hin_a. apply Hin_b. - apply IHOBuch in Hin_a. apply IHOBuch in Hin_b. apply red_incl with (q:=a) in H. exists proof (reds a b Q). apply Hin_a. apply Hin_b. auto.
